snippet: These performers, the touring arm of the Marlboro Music Festival, played “Three Poems in French” and other works at Weill Recital Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews 50th anniversary concert by Musicians From Marlboro, touring arm of Marlboro Music Festival, at Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: These performers, the touring arm of the Marlboro Music Festival, played “Three Poems in French” and other works at Weill Recital Hall.

headline.main: Review: Musicians From Marlboro, With Works by Mozart and Fauré
headline.print_headline: Celebrating a Milestone, With Passion and Detail Leading the Festivities
